title: So here's the concept art for the unreleased "Ivan the Mad Bomber"
body:
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bJ-dTZFJRkY/VPp6g3tKZjI/AAAAAAAAlS8/4hti4hC00cA/s1600/ivan2.jpg

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IW9Ky9xOsFk/VPp6hIODhXI/AAAAAAAAlUI/l3Fav2ZurHw/s1600/ivan3.jpg

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RYrrirMbeJ4/VPp6hTEjwKI/AAAAAAAAlTI/aVK_0D7d0I4/s1600/ivanmadbomb.jpg

He got turned into Ziggs and Nautilus. Sad he had to go, I really like his design.
We always could use more Zaun champions
